# John Edward Cohill

John Edward Cohill (December 13, 1907â€“June 13, 1994) was an American clergyman and bishop for the Roman Catholic Diocese of Goroka in Papua New Guinea. He was born in Elizabeth, New Jersey in 1907. Cohill was ordained to the priesthood in 1936. He was appointed bishop in 1966. He died in 1994.
